price: Kuma idan sun rabu, Allah zai wadãtar da kõwanne daga yalwarSa. Kuma Allah Yã kasance Mayalwaci, Mai hikima.
arabic: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغۡنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلّٗا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yatafarraqā yugh'ni al-lahu kullan min saʿatihi wakāna al-lahu wāsiʿan ḥakīman
